meanings.definition: To make an accusation before the fact.
meanings.sent1: The prosecutor preaccuses the defendant of the crime before the trial begins.
meanings.sent2: She preaccuses her brother of stealing her favorite toy.

meanings.sent5: The fortune teller preaccuses misfortune in the near future.
